head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HAVEY, AMBROSE S. III

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HAVEY, AMBROSE S. III

block.p: HAVEY-Ambrose S. III of Lakewood Ranch, FL. Died November 29, 2001. Former President of Havey Funeral Homes Inc., Yonkers, NY. Husband of Agnes S., father of Barbara of Sarasota, FL and Rev. A. Stewart IV of Lawrenceville, GA. Sister of Jean H. Seward; brother of Perry; 2 grandchildren, Elizabeth and Peter. A memorial will be held at a later date. Memorial donations may be made to The Kidney Foundation.
